Ability_1.Description: Fire an automatic revolver, dealing 550 damage every 0.5s. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6 and is fully effective up to 50 units.

Ability_2.Description: Punch forward, striking enemies in front of you. Deals 520 damage and is fully effective up to 20 units.

Ability_3.Description: Absorb enemy ranged attacks in front of you. After 1.4s, launch a blast that deals 75% of the damage you Absorbed.

Ability_4.Description:
Quickly dash in any direction up to 3 times before needing to recharge.

Passive - Float
Holding reduces your fall speed in the air. Has a range of 31.5 units.

Ability_5.Description: Take flight for 4s and mutate your Revolver. Your mutated Revolver shoots every 0.5s and deals 1000 damage in a 15-unit-radius area. Using this ability consumes 40% of your Ultimate charge and each shot consumes an additional 15%. This Revolver has a maximum Ammo count of 4 and a range of 400 units. Can be refired to cancel.

Lore:
Androxus was once a noble lawman of the Outer Tribunal circuit judges. He and his former partner, Lex, were relentless in their pursuit of criminals and threats to the natural order.

After a tragic confrontation with an Abyssal being claiming to be a goddess, he became afflicted with an otherworldly disease, dooming him with an endless hunger for souls. Now he wanders the Realm, adrift, in a never-ending quest to quell that hunger, stripped of his rank and duties with the Tribunal, and condemned to live with a cursed disease that siphons his soul for eternity.
Name: Androxus
Title: The Godslayer

Ability_1.Description: Fire a burst of shrapnel every 0.9s that explodes, dealing up to 400 damage. This explosion is fully effective up to 7 units and will hit enemies up to 17 units away. Has a maximum Ammo count of 8 and a range of 80 units.

Ability_2.Description: Superheat your next Burst Cannon shot. Your next shot will instantly explode in a frontal cone, dealing 450 damage and applying a Knockback to enemies hit. Fully effective up to 40 units.

Ability_3.Description: Create a Siege Shield that advances forward along the ground. This Shield has 4500 Health and lasts 6s or until destroyed. Affected by Wrecker.

Ability_4.Description: Lower your shoulder and charge forward, dealing 800 damage and applying a strong Knockback. This ability has a range of 120 units.

Ability_5.Description: Leap upward and forward through the air and slam your Banner into the ground, dealing 600 damage and Stunning enemies for 2s in a 30-unit radius on impact. This impact creates a Damage-Immune zone for yourself that lasts 8s. You must remain within the zone to receive its benefits.

Lore: Ash made a name for herself in the Magistrate army by volunteering for front-line duty using experimental heavy armor and siege weaponry. Lacking finesse or subtlety, she more than makes up for it with brutal tactics and overkill. The War Machine, as she is called by her allies and enemies alike, earns the title every time the dust settles and she is all that remains on the scorched battlefield. When the Resistance emerged and brought the war to Crosswind Hold, Ash led the charge against them with fury and determination.
Name: Ash
Title: The War Machine

Ability_1.Description: A futuristic weapon that can be charged up over 1.4s, increasing your Accuracy and damage falloff range, and firing fewer shots depending on its charge. This weapon deals 780 damage, has a maximum Ammo count of 6, and is fully effective up to 50 units at base charge.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a concentrated ball of chronon energy that Rewinds its victim back to where they physically were 4s in the past. This blast reverts their Health to its lowest point during that period.

Ability_3.Description: Create a temporal Barrier in front of you that Absorbs all ranged attacks and projectiles. This barrier lasts 5s.

Ability_4.Description: Rewind yourself to where you physically were 4s in the past. Your Health is reverted to its highest value during that period.

Ability_5.Description: Supercharge your chronon accelerator for 5s. While in this state, you have 3 modified chronon weapon shots that will Banish enemies for 4s. Banished enemies can not be interacted with by anyone. Using this ability consumes 40% of your Ultimate charge and each shot consumes an additional 20%. While using this ability, you are Immune to Crowd Control effects. Can be refired to cancel.

Lore:
There is no light in the future, only an all-consuming Darkness. The Realm is lost. Atlas will be born into this dark future as the son of the legendary judge, Lex. Each day he fights to survive, and each night he finds solace in stories of the Realm that used to be. These stories give Realmkind hope, but their final stand against the Darkness will fail tragically. All hope will be lost... save for one last glimmer.

In a desperate bid, Atlas studied old books of Crystal magic, and mastered the control of time. He researched old tales of what could have been the source of this destruction — of how the world had fallen. Though his timeline was long past saving, he stepped into the past determined to find a way to save the Realm, and stop the Darkness, by changing the course of history itself. In this timeline, he succeeded, though not in ways he could predict.
Name: Atlas
Title: The Man Out of Time

Ability_1.Description:
Throw your hammer in an attack chain of medium, medium, heavy, dealing 525 damage on medium hits and 630 on heavy hits.

Passive - Ire
Taking and dealing damage increases your Ire, which reduces the damage you take by up to 12% at 100% Ire. While you are above 85% Ire, you deal 12% increased damage. Using a basic ability above the Ire threshold augments that ability. Using any basic ability consumes Ire.

Ability_2.Description:
After a brief windup, send out a projectile that explodes into an area in front of you, dealing 300 damage and Lifting enemies hit for 0.25s.

Ire threshold: Reduce the Cooldown of this ability.

Ability_3.Description:
Create a series of 5 Deployable wall segments in a semi-circle, each with 2500 Health. This ability consumes 20 Ire. Can be refired to destroy currently active walls.

Ire threshold: Increase the Health of each segment by 50%.

Ability_4.Description:
Dash forward, carrying up to one enemy with you. Slamming an enemy into a wall will deal damage and stun them. Hitting them into your own Sanctuary walls deals additional damage and Stuns for longer. This ability consumes 15% Ire.

Ire threshold: This ability is used faster.

Ability_5.Description: Rise into the air for up to 6s, reducing the damage you take by 50%. Fire at the ground to throw your hammer, dealing 725 damage and applying Knockback on hit. Shortly after your hammer lands, teleport to it, dealing 250 additional damage and applying a large Knockback in an area.

Lore:
Once the king of a long-forgotten kingdom, the Eternal has existed to see countless reigns end. Forged in the crucible of the Pyre’s flames as the embodiment of all that Persists, Azaan is tasked with maintaining the existence of a Realm kept free from Abyssal influence.

Few still alive have ever had cause to engage with the one of the oldest of the Pyre Lords, but those who have know that his purifying flames care not for friend or foe, only for the complete eradication of the Abyss. Events in the Realm have upset the balance, leading to the Abyss’ influence creeping ever closer, and so the Eternal descends from on high to deliver a final warning to the Realm: deal with the Abyss, or have it be dealt with, by any means deemed necessary -- even if that means others may suffer.
Name: Azaan
Title: The Eternal

Ability_1.Description: A Blunderbuss that shoots pellets, dealing up to 500 damage every 1s. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6 and is fully effective up to 40 units.

Ability_2.Description: Create a Shield in front of you. This Shield has 4000 Health and lasts 6s or until destroyed. Affected by Wrecker.

Ability_3.Description: Deploy a Turret that deals 120 damage every 1s. Turrets have 1000 Health and last until they are destroyed or you die. A maximum of 2 Turrets can be Deployed at once. Deploying a third Turret destroys the oldest Turret. Has a target range of 100 units. Can only target 1 enemy at a time. Affected by Bulldozer.

Ability_4.Description: Charge forward for 1s, greatly increasing your Movement Speed while maintaining turn control. Canceled if refired or if you attack.

Ability_5.Description: Create a Dome Shield and Deploy an additional Flamethrower Turret that deals 600 damage per second to enemies within 30 units. Dome Shield has 10,000 Health and lasts for 6s or until destroyed. The Shield is affected by Wrecker and the Turret is affected by Bulldozer.

Lore:
Long before he came to the Deepwerks and helped develop the crystal-powered technology spreading throughout the Realm, Barik was a clever inventor and resourceful engineer.

Since then, his signature contributions have appeared in almost every field and vocation, from mechanized mining suits and rocket-powered wings, to the crystalline weapons used by Magistrate and Resistance soldiers alike.

After a falling-out with a corrupt Magistrate commander who wanted to turn the Deepwerks into a weapon refinery, he left and pledged his services to Valera and the Resistance. Now, he works to equip the Paladins for their next fight against all those who could harm the Realm.
Name: Barik
Title: The Master Mechanic

Ability_1.Description: Fire a grenade from your launcher every 0.6s that can bounce and explodes after 2s, dealing 560 damage in a small area. The grenade deals 700 damage and has a larger area of effect if you hit an enemy directly. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6.

Ability_2.Description: Launch a grenade that creates additional secondary explosives based on the number of enemy targets hit. The initial explosion deals 250 damage in an area after 0.4s and secondary explosions deal 500 damage in an area after 3s. The grenade can spawn up to 6 additional explosives.

Ability_3.Description: Send out a magazine chock-full of explosives that spray upward and outward to land randomly in a large area around where it deploys. Each explosive deals 370 damage in a 20 unit radius.

Ability_4.Description: Jump forwards and upwards, damaging and knocking back enemies caught behind and below you. You can use this ability up to three times before it goes on Cooldown. Each blast deals 235 damage to enemies within 35 units.

Ability_5.Description: Summon the biggest bomb in your arsenal and hop on, gaining the ability to control your flight. Hitting an enemy will cause an explosion, dealing 1900 damage and knocking the enemy and you away from each other. Reactivate this ability or fire to send the rocket flying out in a straight line towards where you are looking.

Lore: She had it all. The brains, the looks, the POWER. None of the other border lords dared defy her wishes, and her wish was for EVERYTHING. She designed and commissioned the creation of living weapons: bombs meant to bring her enemies' defenses crumbling down and her foes to their knees. What she didn't expect was for one of her newly-created bombs to develop a mind of its own, such as it was. Having lost her domain to the rampant explosions of this new "Bomb King", Beatriz 'Betty' la Bomba has determined that it is time for her creation to return to his rightful place, under her thumb. Whether that is as her partner in expanding her new rule or as bits of scrap for her new toys has yet to be determined. NOTHING will stand in the way of her gadgets and explosives as The Bomb Queen reestablishes herself as the RIGHTFUL ruler of the realm.
Name: Betty la Bomba
Title: The Bomb Queen

abilityDescription2: Launch a grenade that creates additional secondary explosives based on the number of enemy targets hit. The initial explosion deals 250 damage in an area after 0.4s and secondary explosions deal 500 damage in an area after 3s. The grenade can spawn up to 6 additional explosives.

Ability_1.Description: Throw a Sticky Bomb every 0.7s that will stick to surfaces and enemy Champions and can be Detonated. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6 and a range of 500 units. Bombs stuck to Champions detach themselves after 2s and Sticky Bombs auto-detonate when hitting Shields or targets Immune to Crowd Control.

Ability_2.Description: Blow up your Sticky Bombs, dealing up to 850 damage per explosion. Fully effective up to 1.5 units and will hit enemies up to 11 units away.

Ability_3.Description: Throw a Grumpy Bomb up to 200 units that, after hitting a surface, grows angrier and explodes after 3s. This explosion deals 800 damage and Stuns enemies for 2s. Fully effective up to 10 units and will hit enemies up to 45 units away from the explosion.

Ability_4.Description: Throw an unstable Poppy Bomb that sticks to any surface. Detonating this bomb deals 150 damage to enemies and applies a Knockback to yourself and enemies. Has a range of 70 units. The explosion is fully effective up to 20 units.

Ability_5.Description: Embody your reign and become the King Bomb for 5s, able to roll around and explode with <CMD=GBA_Fire> or by refiring the ability. While rolling, you are Immune to Crowd Control. This explosion deals 2500 damage, Stuns enemies for 2s, and applies a Knockback to yourself. This ability ignores Shields, is fully effective up to 5 units, and will hit enemies up to 45 units away. Colliding with an enemy will detonate King Bomb.

Lore:
During a fortress siege long ago, Betty La Bomba decided that the best way to breach her enemy's defenses would be to create walking bombs. Her warlock accidentally strayed from her plans, bringing one of the larger bombs to life, creating the Bomb King: a sentient being who embodied the personality of the Crystal used to create him. After destroying both armies by himself, Bomb King struck out on his own delusional quest to visit the lands under his rule, which happened to be all of them.

The common folk knew better than to offend or even stand very close to him, as his regal demeanor can instantly change to furious, explosive rage at any moment.
Name: Bomb King
Title: His Majesty

Ability_1.Description: A massive shotgun that fires small pieces of shrapnel every 1s, dealing up to 700 damage. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6 and is fully effective up to 35 units.

Ability_2.Description: Throw a net that deals 200 damage to a single enemy and reduces their Movement Speed by 50% for 2s. Has a range of 250 units.

Ability_3.Description: Channel your inner energy and Heal for 1000 over 1.5s. Cannot be canceled.

Ability_4.Description: Leap forward a great height and distance based on the angle at which you activate this ability.

Ability_5.Description: Go Buck Wild, refilling your Ammo and increasing your Attack Speed by 60% for 6s.

Lore:
Buck's fighting style is informed by his diverse and complicated experiences, which are just as unique and esoteric. Pulling from his past experiences in the Thousand Hands Guild, he effectively combines them wtih the self-discipline of a devout monk, clever ambush tactics commonly used by underworld thugs, and the skills and weaponry of a front-line soldier into something more than the sum of its parts.

Once a loyal member of the Sentinels, he returned to Crosswind Hold to join the Resistance in their struggle against the Magistrate. Now, he works with various friends and foes alike to support the Paladins & fight back against both his former groups.
Name: Buck
Title: The Unyielding

Ability_1.Description:
Consume 1 Ammo to unleash your rapier in a chain of attacks, dealing up to 350 damage per hit to enemies. Fully effective up to 65 units. War shares an Ammo pool with Love.

Passive - Passive - Sharp Momentum
Hitting an enemy with War gives you a stack of Sharp Momentum, increasing the rate of fire of Love by 3% for 5s. Maximum of 5 stacks and each stack expires independently.

Ability_2.Description:
Consume 1 ammo to fire your gun once every 0.75s, dealing 350 damage per shot and Slowing enemies hit by 10% for 2s, stacking up to 3 times. Fully effective up to 100 units. Love shares an Ammo pool with War.

Passive - Piercing Momentum
Hitting an enemy with Love gives you a stack of Piercing Momentum, increasing the rate of fire of War by 3.5% for 5s. Maximum of 5 stacks and each stack expires independently.

Ability_3.Description: Shoot out a Piercing projectile that travels more quickly based on the total number of your Piercing and Sharp Momentum stacks. Deals 700 damage and stuns enemies hit for 0.7s.

Ability_4.Description: Twirl forwards, dealing 300 damage and knocking back enemies hit during the dash. While dashing, the damage you take is reduced by 30%. Reactivate the ability to stop and whirl in place, dealing 450 damage to enemies in an area and reducing the Cooldown of this ability by 1s for each enemy hit. Has 2 charges.

Ability_5.Description: Summon 5 ethereal swords around you and refill your Ammo. Each time you fire Love or War, fire off one sword that Pierces all enemies hit, dealing 800 damage per projectile.

Lore:
There are few still alive with the skill… the alluring performance — nay! the enrapturing, dazzling SPECTACLE that is what sights behold you when witnessing this dashing rogue’s deadly skills and quicksilver tongue in action. Blessed with arcane weapons and years of streetwise knowledge and training, he takes what he wants and gives some of it away – if he likes you, of course.

He sought after an abyssal artifact most would deem too dangerous to handle (Hey, it was just lying around!) but worth exorbitant value to Lillith. Now Caspian, Thief of Hearts (and Treasure) has his work cut out for him if he wishes to survive what comes next.

The pursuit of hedonistic perfection is a dangerous occupation, but when has that ever stopped anyone?
Name: Caspian
Title: Thief of Hearts (and Treasure)

Ability_1.Description: Fire a crossbow bolt every 0.75s that deals 680 damage. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6 and is fully effective up to 300 units.

Ability_2.Description: Fire an arrow that deals 300 damage and applies a 1200 Knockback. Has a range of 300 units.

Ability_3.Description: Fire an explosive bolt that deals 450 damage in an area. The explosion is fully effective up to 4 units and hits enemies up to 20 units away.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly roll 40 units in the direction you are moving.

Ability_5.Description: Send your bird Zigs into the sky for 8s, revealing enemies to allies, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%, and your Attack Speed by 20%.

Lore:
Watching all her friends leave the Greenwood to join the fight against the Magistrate, Cassie lamented the promise that bound her bloodline to her family's homeland & their House. When advice from Seris offered her an escape from her obligations, she jumped at the chance, even though she knew the sacrifice she made would haunt her.

Taking nothing but her father's enchanted crossbow and her faithful hunting bird, Zigs, she raced off to join the Resistance in their fight against the relentless Magistrate. However, she could not run forever, and is now forced to face her heritage head-on.
Name: Cassie
Title: The Hunter's Daughter
abilityDescription1: Fire a crossbow bolt every 0.75s that deals 680 damage. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6 and is fully effective up to 300 units.
abilityDescription2: Fire an arrow that deals 300 damage and applies a 1200 Knockback. Has a range of 300 units.
abilityDescription3: Fire an explosive bolt that deals 450 damage in an area. The explosion is fully effective up to 4 units and hits enemies up to 20 units away.
abilityDescription4: Quickly roll 40 units in the direction you are moving.
abilityDescription5: Send your bird Zigs into the sky for 8s, revealing enemies to allies, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%, and your Attack Speed by 20%.

Ability_1.Description: An automatic Machine Pistol that sprays bullets at its enemies. Deals 74 damage every 0.07s, has a maximum Ammo count of 50, and is fully effective up to 125 units.

Ability_2.Description: Target an ally to infuse them with the power of the Abyss. Heals for 450 over 0.5s and then a burst of 800 Health. Has a range of 120 units.

Ability_3.Description: Target an ally to be Marked by fate. Marked allies will receive 60% of the Healing done to other allies with Abyssal Reconstruction. Directly Healing a marked ally will Heal that ally for an additional 15% and will reduce the Cooldown of Abyssal Reconstruction by 1s. Can be used through walls and can only Mark one ally at a time. This Mark will bounce to the nearest ally if the Marked falls.

Ability_4.Description: Project a manifestation of your will forward, Piercing enemies and stopping on walls or after traveling 120 units. Deals 400 damage and Slows enemies hit by 35% for 1.5s. Can reactivate to teleport during flight and for 3s after stopping. If you choose not to Teleport, the Cooldown of Projection is reduced by 2s.

Ability_5.Description: Channel the secrets of the Abyss. Rise up into the air, decreasing the damage you take by 60% and becoming Immune to Crowd Control. While hovering, you have limited movement and can target an area on the ground, dealing 15% of enemy targets' maximum Health as damage and creating a charged area that persists for 6s, dealing 6.25% maximum Health as damage every 0.5s and Slowing enemies caught in it by 45%. This Slow persists for 0.5s after leaving the area. Can be reactivated to cancel.

Lore:
The most difficult decisions test even the strongest of wills, but his will has never wavered, even in the face of seemingly insurmountable odds. He is Corvus, The Magistrate’s Blade. He is the son of Karne, the powerful leader of the Magistrate, but it is by his own merit that he has earned the absolute loyalty of his men and instilled fear in his enemies.

A charismatic leader and brilliant tactician, Corvus stopped at nothing to see his goals realized: a peace to surpass that of the Golden Age, under the Magistrate’s rule. With the near-limitless energy of the Abyss, bent to his iron will, and those soldiers still loyal to his vision of peace, he did what no other was capable of.

Through his actions, Corvus summoned chaos, and slowly lost all he had earned, even to the grave. However, the Magistrate wasn't done with him yet. Corvus was restored...what will he do with his second life?
Name: Corvus
Title: The Magistrate's Blade
abilityDescription1: An automatic Machine Pistol that sprays bullets at its enemies. Deals 74 damage every 0.07s, has a maximum Ammo count of 50, and is fully effective up to 125 units.
abilityDescription2: Target an ally to infuse them with the power of the Abyss. Heals for 450 over 0.5s and then a burst of 800 Health. Has a range of 120 units.
abilityDescription3: Target an ally to be Marked by fate. Marked allies will receive 60% of the Healing done to other allies with Abyssal Reconstruction. Directly Healing a marked ally will Heal that ally for an additional 15% and will reduce the Cooldown of Abyssal Reconstruction by 1s. Can be used through walls and can only Mark one ally at a time. This Mark will bounce to the nearest ally if the Marked falls.
abilityDescription4: Project a manifestation of your will forward, Piercing enemies and stopping on walls or after traveling 120 units. Deals 400 damage and Slows enemies hit by 35% for 1.5s. Can reactivate to teleport during flight and for 3s after stopping. If you choose not to Teleport, the Cooldown of Projection is reduced by 2s.
abilityDescription5: Channel the secrets of the Abyss. Rise up into the air, decreasing the damage you take by 60% and becoming Immune to Crowd Control. While hovering, you have limited movement and can target an area on the ground, dealing 15% of enemy targets' maximum Health as damage and creating a charged area that persists for 6s, dealing 6.25% maximum Health as damage every 0.5s and Slowing enemies caught in it by 45%. This Slow persists for 0.5s after leaving the area. Can be reactivated to cancel.

Ability_1.Description: Fire an explosive mortar every 0.7s that deals 850 damage in an area. Has a maximum Ammo count of 9, and the explosion is fully effective up to 4 units and hits enemies up to 15 units away. Reloading fires a secondary projectile that deals 850 damage on impact.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a burst of up to 3 depth charges over 0.3s that each deal 950 damage in an area. These charges arm when they hit the ground, slowly rising and exploding after 2s. The explosions are fully effective up to 10 units and hit enemies up to 17 units away. This ability consumes your Ammo to fire.

Ability_3.Description: Hurl a harpoon, dealing 800 damage and Slowing enemies hit by 50% for 2s. Harpoon Pierces enemies and has a range of 300 units.

Ability_4.Description: Create a Shortcut, up to a maximum of 2. Traveling through a Shortcut will Teleport you to the other one after a 0.4s delay and destroy the one you used to Teleport. Going through a Shortcut will prevent this ability from being used for 10s.

Ability_5.Description: Create a rift at your target location, unleashing the Abyssal Kraken after 1.7s in a 25-unit radius. The Kraken deals 2500 damage and applies a Knockback to enemies hit.

Lore:
Admiral Judd Roberts ruled the eight oceans as the Realm's most-feared pirate, spreading chaos to all those who oppose him, until one final treasure led to his doom. The admiral stole the Warders' relics from the Resistance, but could not tame the dragons' might. His ship was destroyed, his crew scattered, and he sank to certain death in the oceans' depths.

The Abyss intervened and bore the admiral — now Admiral Dredge — back into the Realm of the living to continue destabilizing everything he touches. Now the undead pirate travels the seas again, and no soul, living or dead, will take his treasure from him. When the Abyss calls, he will be there & he will blast away any foes that stand in their way.
Name: Dredge
Title: Admiral of the Abyss

Ability_1.Description: Fire a rocket every 0.85s that deals 850 damage in an area. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6. The explosion is fully effective up to 4 units and hits enemies up to 10 units away. You deal up to 200 self-damage if caught in your own explosion. Has a range of 275 units.

Ability_2.Description: Spit out a flammable orb that deals 150 damage and causes enemies you directly hit to take 30% additional damage from all sources for 3s. You can ignite Fire Spit with Rocket Launcher or Salvo, dealing 900 damage in an 35-unit area, fully-effective up to 30 units. Has a range of 400 units.

Ability_3.Description: Load all remaining rockets into your Launcher and unleash them with your next attack, dealing 250 damage in an area for each rocket. The explosion is fully effective up to 10 units, hits enemies up to 15 units away, and deals 100% additional damage to Shields. Drogoz deals 150 self-damage if caught in the explosion. Has a range of 275 units. Salvo's rockets count as weapon shots.

Ability_4.Description:
Jet upwards into the air. Hold to use your Booster, which slowly lifts you into the air.

Passive - Booster
You have a booster that has a limited amount of fuel. Fuel regenerates when not in use.

Ability_5.Description: After 2s, unleash your fury to jet up to 400 units through the air, executing the first enemy you collide with regardless of their health. You are Immune to Crowd Control while flying. Cannot hit targets Immune to damage. Ending this ability without hitting anyone refunds 30% Ultimate charge.

Lore:
Born as a Wyrin, a wingless underling to a dragon, Drogoz escaped his servitude after hoarding enough wealth to afford a pair of Crystal-fueled mechanical wings crafted by Barik. The greed required to save for them made his draconic blood flow with cruelty, compelling him to continue on a Realm-wide rampage of destruction as he amassed his own hoard, one that will rival that of the true dragons.

As the conflict throughout the Realm rages on, Drogoz streaks through the sky above, swooping down to deal with his foes as quickly — and as violently — as possible.
Name: Drogoz
Title: The Greedy

Ability_1.Description: Fire a frozen blast every 1s that explodes to deal damage in an area. Deals 850 damage, has a maximum Ammo count of 6, and has a range of 300 units. The explosion is fully effective up to 3 units and will hit enemies up to 10 units away.

Ability_2.Description: Become Immune for 3s. During Ice Block, you are unable to move or attack. Can be refired to cancel.

Ability_3.Description: Teleport forward a short distance and Heal yourself for 100. Has a range of 57.5 units.

Ability_4.Description: Hop on your staff and take flight for 2s. Can be refired to cancel.

Ability_5.Description: Summon a massive Ice Storm that deals 40 damage every 0.25s, lasts 6s, and has a radius of 25 units. Enemies caught have their Movement Speed reduced by 60% and are Crippled.

Lore: After cleverly tricking and imprisoning a greater frost elemental inside a Crystal, Evie went from reserved, apprentice sorceress to wild Winter Witch seemingly overnight. No longer welcome in her home village due to her volatility leaving it in an uncertain fate, she found her talents to be in high demand in conflicts occuring across the Realm.Though powerful, her true motivations are as mysterious as the exact details of her background, causing her allies to question her loyalty as well as how long she can really hope to keep the effects of the elemental from taking over her.
Name: Evie
Title: The Winter Witch

Ability_1.Description: A flamethrower that deals 35 damage every 0.1s and applies an additional effect that deals 200 damage over 2s. Flame Lance recharges when not firing. Your Movement Speed is reduced by 35% while firing. Has a maximum Ammo count of 100 and is fully effective up to 50 units.

Ability_2.Description: Expand your Shield for 8s to block up to 5500 damage. You cannot attack while Shield is active, and you are slowed by 50%. Can be refired to cancel the ability. Affected by Wrecker.

Ability_3.Description: Shoot a ball of fire that Pierces enemies, dealing 450 damage to each enemy hit. Has a range of 400 units.

Ability_4.Description: Dash forward at great speed, Piercing enemies and dealing 400 damage to each enemy hit. Has a range of 45 units.

Ability_5.Description: All allies, including yourself, within 70 units of you cannot be brought below 1500 Health or affected by Damage Over Time effects. This effect lasts 4s and can be refired to cancel. While channeling, you are Immune to Crowd Control and are able to fire Flame Lance, but your Movement Speed is reduced by 50%. This Slow does not stack with the Slow from Flame Lance.

Lore:
Though not of noble birth, and never having been formally trained, Fernando assumed the mantle when the knight he served under met an untimely fate. In his moment of rash courage, he picked up the weapons of said knight — which he learned were infused with Pyre energy. They deemed him worthy, and from that moment on, he wandered from one heroic adventure to the next, making a name for himself throughout the Realm. 

When the Magistrate called on all loyal Houses to join them in their efforts against the Resistance, he heeded their summons with pride. If his valor in combat and charming confidence can keep his allies from discovering his closely-guarded secret, he might just live to become the champion he knows he can be.
Name: Fernando
Title: The Self-Appointed Knight

Ability_1.Description:
A Pyre-forged weapon that deals 315 damage every 0.5s in a burst of bullets with a medium spread. Has a maximum Ammo count of 12 and is fully effective up to 35 units.

Passive - Wrath
Healing allies generates Wrath, which increases your Attack Speed and decays over time. Each tier of Wrath increases your Attack Speed by 10% up to a 30% maximum increase.

Ability_2.Description: Target an ally near your reticle and Heal them for 900 and an additional 400 over 2s. Heals up to 15% more based on targets missing health. Has a range of 200 units.

Ability_3.Description: Summon a beam of searing light that travels forward through obstacles. Enemies caught in its path are Stunned for 1s and take 350 damage. Remaining in the beam deals an additional 20 damage every 0.07s.

Ability_4.Description: Propel yourself backwards and fire 3 projectiles that seek out enemies, dealing 200 damage each. You leap backwards 45 units

Ability_5.Description: Channel the Pyre and become Immune for 2s. Afterwards, increase the Movement Speed and the damage done with weapons by 30% of you and your allies within 150 units. In addition, fully reload the weapons of all affected allies. This effect lasts 8s.

Lore:
Sarah prayed to the Eternal Pyre within the last Pyre Cathedral for the strength to fight the Abyss and to avenge her fallen sister Abby, cruelly sacrificed by the Magistrate due to town tradition to appease an Abyssal rift dwelling below.

Her prayers were answered; she was transformed into Furia: An avenging angel of cleansing flame — Pyre-incarnate. Now the former sisters stand opposed, each a vessel for otherworldly powers far beyond that of mere mortals, yet Furia still holds hope that her sibling isn't gone forever. 

Now, she works with the Paladins to ensure the Realm survives to see her vengeance through.
Name: Furia
Title: Angel of Vengeance

Ability_1.Description: A staff that channels lightning, dealing 65 damage every 0.1s. Deals up to 30% increased damage the longer you are continuously hitting your target. The staff will recharge over time after a brief period of not firing if it has not fully depleted. Has a maximum Ammo count of 100 and is fully effective up to 80 units.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a shocking projectile that Chains between enemy players, dealing 150 damage per bounce. Chains to up to 5 enemies within 50 units and has a range of 300 units.

Ability_3.Description: Deploy a Healing Totem that Heals allies within 30 units for 256 every 1s. Healing Totem has 1250 Health and lasts 6s or until destroyed. This ability has 2 charges and has a Deployment range of 100 units.  Affected by Bulldozer.

Ability_4.Description: Become Ethereal and increase your Movement Speed by 50% for 2s. Removes negative effects on activation.

Ability_5.Description: Surge with elemental power and take flight for 5s, increasing your Movement Speed while channeling. While this ability is active, Slow and strike up to 3 nearby enemies for 200 damage while Healing up to 3 nearby allies for 350 every 0.5s. Allies affected by your Tempest also have their Movement Speed increased by 50% for 2s. Your Tempest has a radius of 50 units. Can be refired to cancel.

Lore:
Being struck by lightning once is usually more than enough to kill someone, but after dozens of strikes, Grohk was still standing. Though it took him a while to realize it, he had been imbued with the power to control the lightning itself, and he put it to good use defending his tribe from a goblin attack that would have otherwise destroyed them.

Seeing his newfound power as a sign from the weather-spirits, the rest of the Red River orcs immediately appointed him their chieftain. When the clash of the Magistrate and Resistance escalated, he sensed a new storm of a different sort brewing and joined the battle on behalf of his tribe. As the dust settles into an uncertain future, all he seeks is a Realm where his people are safe.
Name: Grohk
Title: The Lightning Orc

Ability_1.Description: Hurl your axe through the air every 0.9s, dealing 350 damage at base. The axe's damage is increased based on distance traveled, up to 700 damage.

Ability_2.Description: Throw a vicious axe, dealing 425 damage and Crippling an enemy for 1s. Has a range of 300 units.

Ability_3.Description:
Activate this ability to Heal yourself and allies within 80 units for 600 and 285 over 2.5s.

Passive - Blossom
Heal yourself and allies within 80 units for 75 every 1s.

Ability_4.Description: Throw a vine that latches onto terrain that it touches and then pull yourself towards it. If Vine would fail to latch onto anything, it will not fire. Has a range of 95 units.

Ability_5.Description: Rapidly Heal allies within 40 units for 2500 every 1s. This effect lasts 4s. Can be refired to cancel.

Lore:
The "soul of the forest" isn't some invisible spirit or comforting poem about being "one with nature", it's an angry, walking tree with a huge stone axe. 

After decades of peaceful slumber since the last time Grover had to walk the land — to help put down the Scourges — he awakened once again to find the forests of the Realm threatened by the spread of civilizations, rampant industrialization, and the all-consuming fires of war.

Hefting his trusty axe, he stomped into battle once again intent on destroying anything and anyone who would harm the natural world. As time went on, he learned to trust others who stood for nature enough to join the Paladins in their fight to protect the Realm.
Name: Grover
Title: The Wild

Lore: Long ago, there was chaos and war. The dragons ruled the Realm, and everyone else was left to fight over the scraps. But one wise mage learned the dragons' secrets. She became the first Warder, the first to command a dragon. It was that Warder’s actions that paved the way for the Paladins’ golden age of peace.The Warders were thought to be dead and gone, a relic of a bygone age. Yet, when a beacon was lit in their ancient homeland -- an alarm signal that the Warders, or what remained of them, were needed once again -- Imani answered that call. Little is known about the Last Warder’s past before she appeared in Dredge’s treasure trove to recover her stolen relics, but one thing is sure: she will uphold the legacy of her lineage, and stand against the darkness of the future looming over the Realm.
Name: Imani
Title: The Last Warder

Lore:
As one of the few remaining Stagalla, Inara was reluctant to join the Resistance in their time of need, but she was oath-bound to do so. Originally created to help the original Paladins repel the First Scourge, the stone warden slumbered for generations before being summoned to battle once again, reminded of all her people she'd lost before.

Inara was slow to act, but after witnessing the savage acts committed by the Magistrate, she threw herself once more into the battle, heeding the call of Valera and her Paladins once again. When Valera let the Resistance disband, Inara was left to take charge of the Paladins, they were now hers to lead.
Name: Inara
Title: The Stone Warden

Ability_2.Description: Hold and channel Moonlight into an ally, Healing them for 150 every 0.15s. Moonlight regenerates when not in use. Has a maximum Moonlight of 150 and a range of 125 units.

Luna strikes enemies twice for 180 damage and a third time for 350 damage. Luna can be redeployed to a new location every 8s while alive, with a deploy range of 50 units. Luna has 4000 Health and is affected by Bulldozer. Luna Heals allies around her for 300 per second.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly leap backwards and upwards through the air.

Ability_5.Description: Project an ethereal manifestation of Luna and send it forward. Enemies caught will be pulled along the travel path and take 800 damage if they collide with a wall. You are Immune to damage while releasing Luna.

Lore:
For eons, the moon goddess Io watched over the Realm. Then, disaster struck: the Darkness smothered the goddess's light and shattered the moon that hung above the lands.

Pieces of the moon fell to the Shattered Desert, where Io's faithful watched over them. They kept vigil for the shattered goddess, praying that one day she would return to guide them.

As the Magistrate marched on the desert sands, intending to claim the power of the moon shards in their vicious struggle with the Resistance, that day finally came. At the urging of her celestial contemporary, Jenos, Io revealed her true form to fight for her people and stand against those who would threaten their survival.

Now, in a human form, she is weak but reborn. She has a lot to learn as she protects all those who look to her for hope.
Name: Io
Title: the Shattered Goddess

Ability_1.Description: An automatic carbine that channels the power of the cosmos. Deals 115 damage every 0.13s, has a maximum Ammo count of 30, and is fully effective up to 100 units.

Ability_2.Description: Apply a celestial blessing to an ally at your reticle through all obstacles, Healing for 400 and an additional 220 every 1s for 11s. Has a range of 120 units.

Ability_3.Description: Channel gravitational energy and lift an enemy up, dealing 360 damage over 2.5s. If the target manages to move while lifted, it will interrupt Void Grip. Has a range of 70 units.

Ability_4.Description: Lower your weapon and increase your Movement Speed by 65% while also increasing your jump height and lowering your fall speed.

Ability_5.Description: Lock yourself in place and concentrate for 1.2s, focusing the power of the cosmos to unleash a devastating beam of energy that passes through all obstacles and enemies, dealing 2650 damage. While charging this ability, you are Immune to Crowd Control effects.

Lore:
Jenos was merely a young monk in search of greater wisdom — a reprieve from the ravages of the Second Scourge — when he climbed that mountain many generations ago. He found his answer written among the stars, and ascended into the heavens to dedicate himself to it. He vanished for many years, leaving behind only a small group of followers who were dedicated to carrying on his legacy in the Realm.

Now, as the Realm descends into war once again, so too has Jenos descended from the stars to walk upon the ground once again, joining the battle to help foresee the cosmic horrors of Yagorath. After her defeat, Jenos thought his battle won, however even he could not predict Omen.
Name: Jenos
Title: The Ascended

abilityDescription2: Apply a celestial blessing to an ally at your reticle through all obstacles, Healing for 400 and an additional 220 every 1s for 11s. Has a range of 120 units.

Ability_1.Description:
Stab your straw doll, dealing 300 damage every 0.65s and applying stacks of Curse to your currently targeted foe. Other targets inflicted with Curse will have up to 2 stacks stripped from them to increase the Curse applied to your target by 1. Deals double damage to Deployables and deployed Shields.

Passive - Curse
Your abilities can apply up to 5 stacks of Curse. For each stack, the target deals 2% less outgoing damage and takes 20% increased damage from Kasumi's non-Ultimate Abilities. Cursed enemies are granted a Reveal on you.

Ability_2.Description: Viciously rip through your Yokai Doll, dealing 300 damage and applying 3 stacks of Curse to your target. If the target has stacks of Curse on them already, heal for 80 Health per stack, and an additional 300 Health if the target has 5 stacks of Curse. Deals increased damage per stack of Curse on your target.

Ability_3.Description: Place up to 3 vengeful spirit traps. When an enemy walks within 20 units, these traps explode after a 1s delay. Enemies caught in the blast take 100 damage, are Slowed by 20% for 1.5s, and have 3 Curse stacks applied to them. Spirit Traps have 300 Health and are fully Invisible until enemies get within 15 units of them.

Ability_4.Description: Project your essence outward for 2s, leaving your body behind. While traveling you are Ethereal, gain increased Movement Speed, are Invisible, and your body gains 75% damage reduction. On reactivation or when this ability ends, your body will teleport to you.

Ability_5.Description: Inflict a deadly curse on your target, designating them as a Betrayer. After 1.75s, your target explodes outwards in a series of projectiles. They and any enemy hit will gain 5 stacks of Curse, are Disarmed for 1.5s, and take 42 damage every 0.2s for 3.2s. Damage is increased based on the number of Curse stacks.

Lore:
Some pains persist beyond our physical existence. The bitterest concoctions pale compared to the taste of betrayal by those you hold dear. Once, by a House meant to protect. Twice, by family with barren hearts. Thrice, by the world. You couldn't imagine such pain...

Thankfully, you won’t have to imagine. Powers from beyond the grave infuse this angry spirit on her path of vengeance, and your pain pleases her. It is your privilege to suffer at her hands. It is your fate to atone for the sins of the world. It is your honor to WRITHE. Now, struggle, and die — and offer your souls to Kasumi, Death’s Howl. For she is coming for you all.
Name: Kasumi
Title: Death's Howl

Ability_1.Description: A handheld Repeater that deals 210 damage every 0.26s. Has a maximum Ammo count of 20 and is fully effective up to 170 units.

Ability_2.Description: Activate your gauntlet's Bulwark, creating a Shield that blocks up to 4400 damage. Bulwark regenerates while not active. Your Movement Speed is reduced by 30% while using this ability. Affected by Wrecker.

Ability_3.Description: Shout, becoming Immune to damage for 1.2s and Healing yourself and allies within 40 units for 1350.

Ability_4.Description: Surge forward to grab and Stun an enemy for 1s, then throw them behind you. This ability deals 600 damage and has a range of 50 units.

Ability_5.Description: Target an enemy in sight and drag them to you through the air. While Overpowered, they are helpless and take 220 damage over the total hold duration. Can be fired to launch the victim away, dealing 700 damage in an area if they impact a surface. You are Immune to Crowd Control while this ability is active. Missing refunds 30% Ultimate charge. Has a range of 180 units.

Lore:
When the Patriarch of House Aico issued the command to keep the House's banner upright for the longest amount of time, his captains — strong enough to toss lesser men across the battlefield — couldn't manage to last even a day.

The last captain to attempt was a young Khan, who only lasted hours before he began to tire. As his faltered, he beckoned to a commoner and tasked her with taking up his place in holding it upright.

"Even though I must fall," he said, "the banner will remain."

Thus, he passed the test; this was no test of strength, but one of loyalty to House Aico. Khan proved himself worthy of command that day. Now, he serves as advisor and protector to Grand Magister Lian herself.
Name: Khan
Title: Primus of house Aico

Ability_1.Description:
A combination weapon that deals 170 damage every 0.15s as an energy carbine and modifies its weapon properties while in Sniper Mode. Has a maximum Ammo count of 24 and is fully effective up to 100 units.

Passive - Tag 'Em and Bag 'Em
Enemies hit while in Sniper Mode are Revealed to you for 1s.

Ability_2.Description: Scope up and charge your Sniper Rifle over 1.5s, increasing the damage it deals up to 1200. Consumes 4 Ammo with each shot and is fully effective up to 450 units.

Ability_3.Description: Throw out up to 2 Oppressor Mines that deal 25 damage every 0.2s to an enemy within 50 units. Oppressor Mines have 200 Health and are affected by Bulldozer. Mines will not target mounted enemies.

Ability_4.Description: Throw out a teleporter up to 100 units away that Teleports you to its location after 0.9s.

Ability_5.Description: After 0.25s, channel your inner focus for 5s, dealing 50% increased damage with shots to the upper half of enemies. While this effect is active, Sniper Rifle shots do not consume Ammo.

Lore: As a young recruit in the elite Sentinels, Kinessa took to her sniper lessons with an eagerness and enthusiasm that surprised her mentors. Frustrated by the rigors of military life, she left before she could complete her training and struck out on her own. As the Realm has descended into chaos and war, vigilante bounty contracts have been plentiful, earning her all the fame and fortune she’d lacked while in the service of the Magistrate. She still refuses to pick a side in the conflict, however, because there's much more money to be made by playing both sides than by contracting with either.
Name: Kinessa
Title: The Bounty Hunter

Ability_1.Description:
Submachine Guns: Dual Submachine Guns that fire two rounds every 0.06s, each dealing 38 damage. These guns have a maximum Ammo count of 70 and are fully effective up to 75 units.

Hellkite Claws: Cut the air, launching a fiery slash that deals 650 damage every 0.55s. Fully effective up to 120 units.

Ability_2.Description:
Shadow Step: Quickly dash forward, becoming Ethereal for the 0.6s duration. Has a range of 40 units and consumes 1 unit of Energy.

Skewer: Dash forward and slash all enemies in front of you for 700 damage. Consumes all remaining Energy and has a range of 70 units.

Ability_3.Description: Unleash your Hellkite Claws to gain additional abilities. While in this stance, you are constantly consuming Energy. Requires at least 1 unit of Energy to activate.

Ability_4.Description:
Increase your Movement Speed by 30% and increase your jump height for 4s. Consumes 1 unit of Energy.

Passive - Wall Climb: Hold when running into a wall to climb it.

Ability_5.Description: Melt into the shadows, becoming Ethereal and dealing 1500 damage every 1s over 2s to anyone within 25 units of you. This damage bypasses Shields.

Lore:
Once, a nameless street-rat challenged the tyrant, Zhin. For the boy's courage, and his remarkable skills, Zhin granted him a new life in the Thousand Hands Guild, along with a new name: Koga. The guild became Koga's new family and he became their finest ninja.

But, not all families get along. Out of jealousy, lies were spread and false evidence was planted. Zhin's resulting fury forced Koga to flee. The exiled ninja then fought for his new family — the Resistance — as he searched for the one who betrayed him.

Little does he know, the strings of the Thousand Hands have reached him & his allies, and his betrayer may be closer than ever.
Name: Koga
Title: The Lost Hand

Ability_1.Description: Dual automatic Magnums that deal 320 damage every 0.25s. These Magnums have a maximum Ammo count of 12 and are fully effective up to 60 units.

Ability_2.Description: Begin rapidly firing your Magnums at the nearest enemy with perfect aim, dealing 960 damage over 1.4s. Acts as a weapon shot. Effective up to 200 units.

Ability_3.Description:
Activate Retribution to randomly select a new Retribution target.

Passive - Bounty
You have a Retribution target who is Revealed through walls when within 120 units. Killing your Retribution target grants 30 Credits and 15 additional Credits for each kill in your target's current Killstreak. You get half credits for an Elimination on your target that is not a Killing Blow.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly slide forward, retaining the ability to fire your weapons while sliding. This ability has a range of 40 units.

Ability_5.Description: Release an infallible surge of Judgement, destroying Shields, Executing enemies at or below 65% Health, and resetting the Cooldown of In Pursuit. Deals 600 damage to enemies above 65% Health. Has a range of 120 units.

Lore:
The Outer Tribunal is made up of merciless, oathbound judges, with none more dedicated than Lex. His partner, Androxus, traversed the outskirts of the Realm with him, tracking down infamous criminals and battling all manner of horrors on behalf of the Magistrate and its people.

During an Outer Tribunal mission, the pair were offered a deal that could lend them power.  Lex stood fast, but Androxus succame to its influence. Watching his partner abandoned their duties and rise to the top of the Outer Tribunal target list, Lex took up his former partner's weapon to honor the oath they took. Vowing to right this wrong and one day take his former friend in: dead or alive.
Name: Lex
Title: The Hand of Justice

Ability_1.Description: An automatic rifle passed down through house Aico that deals 400 damage every 0.45s. Has a maximum Ammo count of 8 and is fully effective up to 90 units away.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a charged shot dealing 400 damage to all enemies within 425 units in front of you. Acts as a weapon shot.

Ability_3.Description: Charge your rifle for 0.5s, then fire a long-range shot, Piercing enemies and dealing 800 damage to each. Acts as a weapon shot and has a range of 300 units.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly dodge in the direction you are moving and fire a rifle shot, dealing 400 damage to the enemy nearest to where you are aiming. Acts as a weapon shot. This ability has a movement range of 30 units.

Ability_5.Description: Channel the power of your noble blood, taking 50% reduced damage for 1s, then fire a powerful blast that pierces enemies, dealing 1600 damage. Killing an enemy with Enlightenment refunds 50% of the Ultimate charge. Has a range of 300 units.

Lore:
After a successful ploy to set herself up as the legitimate heiress to the Ruby Throne, nothing stood in Lian's way. Her sincere dedication to her family's legacy may have earned her the title of Scion, but her skill with the rifle is what won her the respect of her family's Royal Guard.

When the Magistrate called on all loyal houses to unite against the Resistance, she was honor-bound to accept, arriving from her far-off homeland to represent House Aico along with her faithful bodyguard and general, Khan, and her closest advisor, Rei. Her politics were only further rewarded when Karne stepped down, abdicating the Magistrate and the title Grand Magister, to her and House Aico.
Name: Lian
Title: Scion of House Aico

Ability_1.Description:
Lillith shoots a charged bolt of blood from her esoteric cube every 1s, dealing 625 damage. Has a maximum Ammo count of 4 and is fully effective up to 200 units.

Passive - Blood
Lillith uses a modified Blood Health pool that acts as both your Champion Health and as a resource to cast her abilities. Both Swarm and Death Wings use some of her Blood to use.

Ability_2.Description: Lillith casts a hex on an enemy or an ally, placing either a damaging or Healing effect on the target that applies over time. Enemies take 1.5% of their current Health every 0.325s, while Allies are Healed for a scaling value up to 600 every 0.5s based on the duration of the ability. Lillith regenerates Blood while Blood Hex is active. Has a range of 95 units.

Ability_3.Description:
Lillith summons a circular swarm of bats to Heal her allies for 75 every 0.25s and damage her enemies for 55 every 0.25s. Hold down the activation button to channel this ability for longer, increasing the Healing and damage it does after activation. Has 3 channeled states depending on the duration of channeling. Lasts for 5.75s and has a range of 85 units.

Costs 825 Blood to cast.

Ability_4.Description:
Lillith leaps into the air and gains air control. Reactivate Death Wings to slam directly into the ground, dealing 225 damage in a 15 unit radius.

Costs 350 Blood to cast.

Ability_5.Description: Lillith channels the Blood Moon, granting Allies 35% pure Lifesteal that is not affected by Anti-Heal. Lillith takes 50% less damage and moves 50% slower while activating this ability. During this ability, Lillith has increased Movement Speed, jumps higher, and regenerates 475 Blood every 1s. Lasts for 8s.

Lore:
Lillith, through ill-fortune and fear, has found herself on the path of this defiled discovery.   Once a staunch defender of the Magistrate, Lillith was a confidant and friend of Lian; even becoming a border-lord in the far off lands over which Lian holds dominion. Yet, this proud life would not last forever. Gravely wounded in a border incursion by Resistance fighters, Lillith painstakingly crawled away from the battlefield, cursing those who brought her to death’s door. What Lillith didn’t know – what she couldn’t have imagined, was that the Abyss would reach out to her and offer her a gift…an offer that was too powerful to refuse.

Now, Lilith reigns from her dark corners of the Realm. Aided by her unnaturally long life and keen mind, Lillith dashes from shadow to shadow with her deadly Heart of Crimson: a sinister weapon that swells with unnatural power whenever it tastes the blood of her enemies. Lillith works towards a Realm blessed by the bounteous gifts once bestowed on her...ones that nobody will be allowed to deny.
Name: Lillith
Title: The Heartless

Ability_1.Description:
Throw two Daggers every 1s, each dealing 400 damage. Fully effective up to 300 units.

Passive - Double Jump
You have an additional jump at your disposal

Ability_2.Description: Quickly dash forward. Colliding with an enemy stops you and performs a melee strike, dealing 400 damage and bouncing you backward. Pounce has a range of 50 units.

Ability_3.Description: Reset the Cooldowns of Pounce and Prowl and Heal yourself for 400.

Ability_4.Description: Increase your Movement Speed by 50% and increase your jump height. This effect lasts 5s and will be canceled by using another ability or firing your weapon.

Ability_5.Description: Enemies within 300 units have their vision restricted to a 30-unit radius for 4s.

Lore:
After making a name for herself as a skilled thief and knife-fighter, the half-tigron Maeve decided to join the war between Magistrate & Resistance for personal gain, selling her services to the highest bidder. She dashes from shadow to shadow with unnatural agility, concealed by her magical long coat — a souvenir from one of her most daring burglaries: the highly guarded Magistrate's Archives.

While her employers find her talents useful, they often complain of suspiciously misplaced valuables and lost coins after she moves on to the next fight.
Name: Maeve
Title: of Blades

Ability_1.Description: A salvaged ship cannon that fires a cannonball every 1s that deals 575 damage. Has a maximum Ammo count of 5 and is fully effective up to 75 units.

Ability_2.Description: Reel an enemy in, dealing damage, Stunning them, and pulling them in front of you. Deals 100 damage on initial hit. Cannot pull through walls. Has a range of 75 units.

Ability_3.Description: Project a 4000-Health Shield around yourself in an area. This Shield lasts 5s or until destroyed. This ability can be refired to cancel. Affected by Wrecker.

Ability_4.Description: Retreat into your shell and spin forward, passing through enemies, dealing 500 damage to them and applying a Knockback to anyone hit. Has a range of 44 units.

Ability_5.Description: Call on the powers of the Ancients. Drop your cannon and start swinging your anchor, dealing 550 every 0.8s to enemies within 20 units in front of you. While this ability is active, you have 4000 increased maximum Health and are Immune to Crowd Control. This effect lasts 8s and can be refired to cancel.

Lore:
Once the dedicated protector of Turtle Cove, the island home of the Ska'drin, the ancient Makoa has now been summoned to the mainland. In his absence, he fears that he cannot ensure the safety of the volcanic islands.

With the greater threat in the Realm, he's taken to the land to make sure those he protects have a home to return to. With him, he brings the ocean's fury and the tortoise's indomitable resilience, as well as various naval implements, to bear against those who would defile the natural world.

However, long has he been away from home... what has come of the Ska'drin he has left behind. Was he wrong to have left?
Name: Makoa
Title: The Ancient

Ability_1.Description: Fire a glob of venom in an arc every 0.55s, dealing 400 damage. Has a maximum Ammo count of 10. When 90% done with your reload, throw the Cobra, dealing 200 damage and Stunning for 1s on hit. Enemies stunned by the Cobra cannot be Stunned for another 3s.

Ability_2.Description: Channel the spirits to enchant an ally at your crosshair location, restoring 85 Health every 0.25s for 4s. The Cooldown of this ability is reduced by 1.75s if you fail to hit an ally.

Ability_3.Description: Toss a potent alchemic gourd that explodes on the ground in a 25-unit radius for 4.8s. Allies standing inside the radius are Healed for 65 every 0.2s, while enemies are dealt 55 damage every 0.2s.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly slither forward 54 units, becoming Untargetable for the duration.

Ability_5.Description: Fire a dark vessel that explodes when it impacts, causing all enemies in a 40-unit radius to become Feared for 2s. Reactivate this ability to detonate the vessel early.

Lore: When Wekono, the Mother of Sorrow and Revenge, turns her gaze to the mortal world, she appoints a champion among the Ska'drin people. In this cycle, the island witchdoctor Mal'Damba has been gifted with her powers, and sent into battle to evangelize her faith by laying waste to any who would stand before his goddess.His mastery of dark magic and virulent poisons was already impressive before the insidious goddess imbued him with even greater abilities, rendering him one of the deadliest beings in the Realm, an extension of Wekono's will.
Name: Mal'Damba
Title: Wekono's Chosen
abilityDescription1: Fire a glob of venom in an arc every 0.55s, dealing 400 damage. Has a maximum Ammo count of 10. When 90% done with your reload, throw the Cobra, dealing 200 damage and Stunning for 1s on hit. Enemies stunned by the Cobra cannot be Stunned for another 3s.
abilityDescription2: Channel the spirits to enchant an ally at your crosshair location, restoring 85 Health every 0.25s for 4s. The Cooldown of this ability is reduced by 1.75s if you fail to hit an ally.
abilityDescription3: Toss a potent alchemic gourd that explodes on the ground in a 25-unit radius for 4.8s. Allies standing inside the radius are Healed for 65 every 0.2s, while enemies are dealt 55 damage every 0.2s.
abilityDescription4: Quickly slither forward 54 units, becoming Untargetable for the duration.
abilityDescription5: Fire a dark vessel that explodes when it impacts, causing all enemies in a 40-unit radius to become Feared for 2s. Reactivate this ability to detonate the vessel early.

Ability_1.Description: Deal 30 damage every 0.08s in a column of magical energy. Applies 1 Magic Marks to each enemy hit, stacking up to 10 Marks. Fully effective up to 55 units.

Ability_2.Description: Deal 300 damage every 0.7s with a magical projectile. Deals increased damage at 8, 9, and 10 stacks of Magic Marks on the enemy up to 1000 damage at 10 stacks. Fully effective up to 300 units.

Ability_3.Description: Project a Barrier around yourself that Absorbs all attacks made against you. Enemies that hit you while your Barrier is active receive 10 stacks of Magic Marks. This effect lasts for 2s.

Ability_4.Description: Scamper forward for 1.5s, greatly increasing your Movement Speed.

Ability_5.Description: Cast an arcane spell that Transforms a single victim into a treat. Coming into contact with your Transformed victim Executes them and prevents ability-based Revival. Effective up to 500 units.

Lore:
While the rest of her kind have fled into the burrows under the Enchanted Forest to avoid the war raging across the Realm, Moji took it upon herself to use her Leipori magic to defend the world.

She charges into battle atop her trusty familiar, Po-Li, who carries her through the fray as she unleashes a maelstrom of sorcerous destruction on her enemies. 

Once the war is over and the Realm has returned to its natural state, she hopes to return to the Enchanted Forest to begin the healing process and help the Leipori restore all that was lost.
Name: Moji
Title: and Friends
abilityDescription1: Deal 30 damage every 0.08s in a column of magical energy. Applies 1 Magic Marks to each enemy hit, stacking up to 10 Marks. Fully effective up to 55 units.
abilityDescription2: Deal 300 damage every 0.7s with a magical projectile. Deals increased damage at 8, 9, and 10 stacks of Magic Marks on the enemy up to 1000 damage at 10 stacks. Fully effective up to 300 units.

abilityDescription4: Scamper forward for 1.5s, greatly increasing your Movement Speed.
abilityDescription5: Cast an arcane spell that Transforms a single victim into a treat. Coming into contact with your Transformed victim Executes them and prevents ability-based Revival. Effective up to 500 units.

Ability_1.Description:
Punch and send out energy in a five hit attack chain, dealing 200 damage quickly for the first three hits and 425 damage slowly for the last two. This chain resets to the first attack on a miss, or after not firing for 1.25s. Deal an extra 75 damage if your target is within 20 units of you. Has no Ammo or Reload.

Passive - Queen of Change
Gain up to 20% Bonus Healing the closer you are to an Objective Point. Gain a static 10% Bonus Healing on Maps without an Objective.

Ability_2.Description: Fire a projectile that leaves behind an Abyssal Rift when it explodes; the projectile detonates on contact or after reaching its max travel distance. Hold down the activation button to channel this ability, causing the projectile to deal more damage and travel farther, reaching max power after channeling for 1.1s. The projectile will deal 200 damage and travel 25 units at base, 275 damage and 50 when charged >0.55s, and 350 damage and 100 units when charged for 1.1s. The Abyssal Rift left behind deals 50 damage to enemies within 30 units every 0.5s, reducing hit enemies' Movement Speed by 25% for 0.5s. After 2s the Abyssal Rift explodes, dealing 200 damage to enemies within 15 units.

Ability_3.Description: Call forth an Abyssal Shield with up to 4500 Health at the target location, placing it up to 90 units away. The Shield is stronger the closer it is placed to you, losing 1500 Health for every 30 units its placed away from you.

Ability_4.Description: Summon a poison aura for 6s that follows you and Poisons enemies within 60 units for 5% of their maximum health over 6s. While this aura is active, any damage you take is instead stored, being dealt to you over 4s with additional damage refreshing the duration. Refiring this ability will send out Abyssal Chains that pull enemies within 50 units towards you, but will end the ability early.

Ability_5.Description: Tear a rift into the Abyss, becoming CC immune and dealing 100 damage to enemies within 50 units every 0.5s and pulling them in. After two pulses, stomp and cause an explosion, dealing 600 damage to enemies and stunning them for 2s.

Lore: In the far past, Nyx was once a Pyre Lord, working alongside Azaan and others in the seemingly eternal fight against the chaotic Abyss. Over time, she found herself disillusioned with the ways of the Pyre and their rigid controlling dogmas - so content to throw away countless lives in their endless wars. She would show the Pyre the power of freedom, true freedom. Approaching the one who would eventually be know as Seris, they devised a plan for Nyx to begin her great betrayal. Nyx left the Pyre behind and traveled through one of Seris' portals into a Lord's fortress. Once there Nyx slew and subdued all who stood in her way in a violent bloodbath. Even the residing Lord was no match for her fury, their name lost to time - cementing herself as an Abyssal Lord. Her time in the Abyss has changed her physically, but she remains determined to bring a new age of chaos and freedom to the Realm. With her growing army behind her, she offers power to those who will accept it: a united front through strength and the chaos of free will - a force strong enough to overwhelm the Pyre wholly.
Name: Nyx
Title: Queen of the Abyss

Ability_1.Description:
A fully-automatic marksman rifle that deals 415 damage every 0.3s while scoped, has a maximum Ammo count of 12, and is fully effective up to 150 units. Non-scope shots deal 250 damage every 0.2s.

Passive - Commander: At the start of the match, make a selection from 4 Passive abilities that buff you & your allies' cooldowns, Credits, respawns, or ultimate rate for the entire match

Ability_2.Description: Look down your sights and gain increased accuracy; your Movement Speed is reduced by 50%. Using this ability while you are in the air stops your movement, allowing you to fire for up to 2.5s. While active, this ability allows you to see enemies within friendly and enemy Distortion Fields.

Ability_3.Description: Create an opaque dome for 3.5s that hides allies and prevents from seeing outside of it while inside. Enemies caught within the Distortion Field have their Movement Speed reduced by 15%.

Ability_4.Description: Leap into the air to gain control of the battlefield. Aiming down sights with your rifle will cause you to levitate in air for up to 2.5s.

Ability_5.Description: Rain down a laser barrage upon your enemies that deals 850 damage per beam - the Creeping Barrage is cast out in a devastating line in front of Octavia. The beam cluster is setup into two parts: a smaller targeting beam that deals 100 damage and destroys shields. if it makes contact, and the large damaging beam that deals 850 damage.

Lore:
Conflict is ancient, war is perspective, but survival is the only real objective. For those who survive, there is a better life somewhere past that conflict; that is what Octavia is fighting for: a better life for us all.

The crucible of war has sharpened her battlefield instincts to a razor’s edge, but she had long left that life behind. However, after an attack against the Magistrate from Furia took her leg: Octavia's unwavering determination to the Magistrate reignited, and she re-enlisted to lead. Where there is hope, she will find that spark and fan it into a roaring blaze, inspiring her troops with unwavering loyalty. The greatest threats to the Realm will have to survive meeting Octavia, the Indomitable.
Name: Octavia
Title: The Indomitable

Ability_1.Description:
A hybrid shotgun with two firing modes. Has a Range of 300 units and is effective up to 100 units. Applies Ominous Brand.

Tap: Penumbra Mode: Deals 500 damage every 0.3s in a wide spread.

Hold: Antumbra Mode: Deals 500 damage every 0.48s in a narrow spread. Fire rate and spread scale down over the first 3 shots, which resets after 1s of not firing.

Passive - Ominous Brand
Branded enemies receive additional effects from Deadly Domain and Gravity Vice for 3s.

Ability_2.Description:
Place a pool of poison that lasts for 5s and increases in size over its duration. The pool Poisons enemies for 60 damage every 0.2s as long as they're within it.

Enemies with Ominous Brand are also Slowed by 15%.

Ability_3.Description:
Channel and alter gravity, lifting an enemy into the air for 1s before violently pushing them away from your current position for 400 damage. After pushing an enemy, Aphotic Reaver is set to Antumbra mode for 2s.

Enemies with Ominous Brand are Marked and ignited when pushed, taking 15% bonus damage from Aphotic Reaver and 10 damage every 0.3s for 3s.

Ability_4.Description:
Instantly dash 45 units in the direction you're moving, leaving behind Abyssal spikes that deal 30 damage every 0.2s that last for 5s. Colliding with an enemy Champion stops you and knocks them back slightly, dealing 200 damage. Applies Ominous Brand.

Can be cast during Gravity Vice.

Ability_5.Description: Channel for 0.5s, becoming CC Immune and reducing your Movement Speed by 50%, before placing a 30 unit Blinding Abyssal Rift at the target location. After 1.5s the Blind dissipates, and the Rift fires a beam upwards dealing 666 damage every 0.15s for 4s. Applies Ominous Brand.

Lore: Omen was in search of greater power — the help his family deserved — when he climbed a flaming mountain looking for wisdom like that of Jenos. Instead of finding answers like that of Ascension Peak, he was met with a void of silence from the night sky. Lost in rage, he threw himself into the lava boiling below him. Before he perished, Nyx answered the prayers cosmic gods ignored. She granted him the power to do what he felt the gods should. Now, as the Realm descends into chaos once more, Omen ascends from the Abyss to serve his Queen, joining the battle to see to the fall of Jenos and his home. Soon, they will all feel the wrath of a god.
Name: Omen
Title: Disciple of the Abyss

Ability_1.Description: Fires a volatile potion every 1s that deals 600 damage in an area. The explosion is fully effective up to 3 units and hits enemies up to 12 units away. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6.

Ability_2.Description: Launch an explosive flask that deals 145 damage and Slows enemies by 50% for 2.5s in an area. Fully effective up to 6 units and will hit enemies up to 25 units away.

Ability_3.Description: Throw a potion that Heals allies for 1000 in a 50-unit radius on impact. Reactivate this ability to explode the potion in the air.

Ability_4.Description: Launch yourself upwards and increase your jump height for 2.5s.

Ability_5.Description: Launch a mysterious flask that Polymorphs and deals 200 damage in a 40-unit radius, turning vulnerable enemies into helpless chickens for 4s. Chickens have 1500 Health and return to their previous state and Health values when the effect ends. Has a minimum Polymorph duration of 2s.

Lore:
Most Vulpin are pacifists. Pip is not like most Vulpin. Specializing more in weaponized explosives than curative alchemy, he left his homeland of Brightmarsh, in search of adventure across the Realm.

Now, he splits his time between creating restorative potions to aid his friends and brewing up fiery concoctions to test out on his enemies. While his allies have come to appreciate his assistance and expertise, they fully understand that the little fox is as unpredictable as his dangerous mixtures.
Name: Pip
Title: The Rogue Alchemist

Ability_1.Description:
An Abyssal, soul-shredding Gatling gun that spins up before firing. After 1s, it starts to fire, reaching its maximum Attack Speed after an additional 2s. At maximum rev, it deals 40 damage every 0.05s. Has a maximum Ammo count of 500, and is fully effective up to 80 units.

Passive - Soul Shred
Every six shots that hit an enemy shatters a part of their soul, creating a Soul Fragment. Soul Fragments can be collected by colliding with them or by activating Soul Harvest.

Ability_2.Description: Ignite your Hellfire Gatling to immediately fully spin it up and cause it to consume no Ammo for 3s after activation.

Ability_3.Description: Harvest your enemies' shattered souls, generating 2000 Soul Armor and drawing all loose Soul Fragments to you. Soul Fragments generate an additional 200 Soul Armor on pickup. You can have a maximum of 4000 Soul Armor.

Ability_4.Description: After 1.2s, charge for 3.5s, dealing 600 damage and applying a 900 Knockup to each player hit. You maintain limited turn control and reduce the effectiveness of Knockup effects applied to you while charging.

Ability_5.Description: Savagely stomp the ground and send forth a shockwave in a 45-degree cone that deals 999 damage and Stuns enemies for 1.2s. This ability Pierces enemies, destroys Shields and Deployable walls, and has a range of 100 units. You are rooted and Immune to Crowd Control while using this ability. You can turn up to 60 degrees in either direction after activation.

Lore:
All tremble at the mere mention of his name. He is wrath. He is fury. He is Raum, Rage of the Abyss. Consumed by burning conflict, tempered in the Abyss, his purpose is clear — annihilation.

He has fought and triumphed over every entity in those war-scarred plains, shattering every soul that stands against his might. Few remain who are still worthy of his attention, and their conflicts grow stale. He found himself summoned to the Realm, a fertile ground teeming with new victims whose souls are too well-connected to their bodies. As long as there is a Realm to destroy, his havoc will never end.
Name: Raum
Title: Rage of the Abyss

Ability_1.Description: Unleash magical energy from your hands, dealing 450 damage every 0.7s.

Ability_2.Description: Manifest arcane forces and send them outward, Chaining between your initial target and up to 4 additional allies, Healing them for 600 per bounce. Spirit Linked allies are Healed for 30% more.

Ability_3.Description: Tether your spirit to an ally or enemy player. While Linked to an ally, you Heal them for 50 and grant them 0.5% Ultimate charge every 1s. While Linked to an enemy, reduce their Movement Speed by 10% and deal 50 damage every 0.75s.

Ability_4.Description: Envelop yourself with Arcane energy, reducing the maximum amount of damage you can take to 275 per instance of damage and increasing your Movement Speed by 40% and your jump height by 50% for 3s. Enemies with 8 units take 20 damage every 0.2s. Spirit Linked allies are also Enveloped.

Ability_5.Description: Unleash a burst of energy into your Linked ally and infuse them with life, making both of you Immune to damage for 2s. After a brief delay, you and your ally Heal for 75% of your respective maximum Health. Can be used even if not Linked to an ally.

Lore:
When Rei left her warren in The Burrows, she pointed her ears towards the pursuit of a mastery of magic beyond any other living being. Her quest led her to the seat of the Ruby Throne, where she found the means to achieve her ambitions.

She became fast allies and faster friends with the Scion of House Aico, Lian, gaining access to the resources of a powerful noble House in exchange for her services and advice. She strives to harness with even greater control and power the chaotic arcane forces that run throughout the Realm and bind it together. A rare magical prodigy, she was instrumental in Lian's ascent to Grand Magister. Now, she can pursue her true calling: becoming the greatest archmage the Realm has ever seen.

The Scholar of House Aico pursues perfection, and she will throw the book at anyone who gets in her way
Name: Rei
Title: Scholar of House Aico

Ability_1.Description: Miniguns that deal 40 damage every 0.05s once fully spun up. Continue firing to increase your rate of fire. Has a maximum Ammo count of 200 and is fully effective up to 85 units.

Ability_2.Description: Fire two missiles at enemies that each deal 225 damage in a 15-unit-radius explosion. Fully effective up to 500 units. Has 3 charges.

Ability_3.Description: Project a Shield around yourself that blocks up to 2000 damage and lasts for 4s or until destroyed. Affected by Wrecker.

Ability_4.Description: Quickly jet in the direction you are moving. You are able to fire while using Advance. This ability has 2 charges and has a range of 30 units.

Ability_5.Description: After 1s, reveal 2 miniguns and rocket launchers that fire rapidly for 4s. The guns deal 120 damage every 0.04s and the launchers deal 250 damage every 0.25 seconds in a 10-unit-radius area. You take 10% reduced damage, but your Movement Speed is reduced by 75% while this effect is active. Ruckus is Immune to Crowd Control while this ability is active. Can be refired to cancel. Fully effective up to 200 units.

Lore: While toiling in the gold mines, a particularly wily and inventive goblin named Ruckus stumbled upon the long-lost mind-stone of a fallen war-golem. He installed the relic into his mechanical digging suit, hoping it would provide the suit with enough power to outperform the other miners. He was quite surprised when the ancient sentience reawakened and brought the suit to life. Though it resented its situation, its pilot, and the name it was given, Bolt nonetheless agreed to a tentative partnership, one that freed them both to scour the Realm in search of fame, fortune, and upgrades.
Name: Ruckus
Title: The Worst of Friends
